recipesJson.name: UNHOLY SINS
recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description: This is a reminder to myself I dont need 10+ flavors in a recipe ..This is a remix of Deadly sin ejuice from  Good life vaper. The description is a tobaccoish bakery , I Did some research on this mix and substituted Ry4d for holy grail this is super tasty and simple again if you dont want Fw yellow cake substitute Capella sugar cookie. CAUTION coil killer...
